body_html: In your above example, changing torch.tensor([5, 4, 2]) to torch.tensor([5, 4, 2], dtype=torch.int) solves the issue. This does not solve the case for when lengths are not explicitly specified (i.e. when not using a packed sequence).
body_text: In your above example, changing torch.tensor([5, 4, 2]) to torch.tensor([5, 4, 2], dtype=torch.int) solves the issue. This does not solve the case for when lengths are not explicitly specified (i.e. when not using a packed sequence).
body: In your above example, changing `torch.tensor([5, 4, 2])` to `torch.tensor([5, 4, 2], dtype=torch.int)` solves the issue. This does not solve the case for when lengths are not explicitly specified (i.e. when not using a packed sequence).
